page.title: 07Typical Games
page.content: One game we play is{Britsh Bulldogs. To play this game you have to choose a person to be on and then that person says the name of another person who has to run past the person who called him without getting caught.If they are caught they help the catcher. Another game is{Tag.}One person is on and he has to run after the others and tag them. Then they are on and they have to tag someone.{ {Railings}.To play this you have to have a wall. Someone is on and they have to try and touch someone else.If they touch someone else that person has to go to the wall and lean against it with one arm straight out.Someone else has to go under the person's arm and if they do that person is free.The person who is on has to stop this from happening by tagging them first.
